params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. The name of the device. For example, projects/p0/locations/us-central1/registries/registry0/devices/device0 or projects/p0/locations/us-central1/registries/registry0/devices/{num_id}.

params.name: data.field_mask
params.description: The fields of the Device resource to be returned in the response. If the field mask is unset or empty, all fields are returned.
